title: 5 Must-Try Egg Waffle Sandwich Recipes
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Egg waffles are a fun twist on the traditional breakfast sandwich, offering a variety of flavors and combinations. Here are just a few recipes that are sure to brighten up your day.

  1. Asiago Egg Waffle Sandwiches

Craving a savory blend of avocado, eggs, and cheese? The asiago egg waffle sandwich is crispy, creamy, and oh so delicious. It’s made with three cups of asiago cheese, eight large Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, ½ teaspoon pepper, ¼ teaspoon salt, four slices bacon, ½ an avocado, and four tablespoons of asiago cheese.

View the full recipe.

  1. Herbed Cheddar Sausage and Egg Waffle Sandwiches

Great for breakfast or dinner, the herbed cheddar sausage and egg waffle sandwich recipe is a great mashup of protein and comfort food. This recipe calls for two cups of waffle mix, ½ cup grated cheddar cheese, a handful of baby spinach, four sausage patties, four Chino Valley Ranchers eggs (we suggest pasture raised eggs for a brighter color), ¼ cup milk, three tablespoons of chopped fresh herbs (rosemary, sage, and thyme), and one tablespoon butter.

View the full recipe.

  1. Waffle Egg Sandwiches with Spicy Maple Butter

If you’ve never had a spicy waffle egg sandwich, now is your chance. For the sandwich, you’ll need eight waffles, two tablespoons of butter, four large eggs, salt, pepper, four slices cheddar cheese, and eight slices of bacon. The spicy maple butter is made with ½ cup maple syrup, ⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon, ⅛ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, a pinch of salt, and eight tablespoons of unsalted butter.

View the full recipe.

  1. BLT Waffle Sliders

Swap out sliced bread for waffles and you’ve got an extra crunchy twist on BLT. The BLT Waffle Sliders are made with flour, cornmeal, baking powder, sugar, salt, eggs, 2% milk, butter, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, bacon, tomatoes, lettuce, and seasoning.

View the full recipe.

  1. Monte Cristo Waffle Sandwich

We’ve saved the absolute best for last: the Monte Cristo Waffle Sandwich. Sweet, cheesy, and creamy — it’s a treat you won’t be able to resist. The recipe calls for whole grain waffles, swiss cheese, shaved honey baked ham, raspberry jam, shaved turkey, eggs, milk, and melted butter. Now, go on and check out the instructions linked below!
